price: Enyi wafungwa wenzangu wawili! Je, mabwana wengi wanao farikiana wao kwa wao ni bora au Mwenyezi Mungu Mmoja Mwenye nguvu?
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
footnotes: Enyi wenzangu wawili wa gerezani! Je mabwana wengi mbali mbali ni bora mtu kuwanyenyekea kuliko Mwenyezi Mungu Mmoja asiye shindika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
